description.en: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Red. Lasts 7 days.
description.ar: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Red. Lasts 7 days.
description.br: Esta mística orbe irá mudar a cor da aura da sua armadura fortalecida para a cor Vermelha. Dura 7 dias.
description.cns: 这个神秘的球体会将你升级后的盔甲光效的颜色更改为红色。持续7天。
description.de: Ändert die existierende Aura aufgewerteter Rüstungssets in die Farbe Rot.
description.fi: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Red. Lasts 7 days.
description.fil: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Red. Lasts 7 days.
description.fr: Votre armure enchantée émet une aura rouge pendant 7 jours.
description.id: Bola mistis ini akan mengubah warna aura armor yang kamu upgrade menjadi Red. Berlangsung selama 7 hari.
description.it: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Red. Lasts 7 days.
description.jp: 防具の精錬エフェクトを赤色に変化させることのできる期間制アイテム
description.kr: 이 신비로운 아이템은 업그레이드된 갑옷의 아우라 색상을 빨간색으로 바꿉니다. 7일간 지속됩니다.
description.nl: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Red. Lasts 7 days.
description.pl: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Red. Lasts 7 days.
description.ru: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Red. Lasts 7 days.
description.sp: Este orbe místico cambiará el color del aura de tu armadura mejorada a Rojo. Dura 7 días.
description.sw: This mystical orb will change the color of your upgraded armor's aura to Red. Lasts 7 days.
description.th: ลูกแก้วลึกลับนี้จะเปลี่ยนสีของออร่าของเกราะที่อัพเกรดเป็นสีแดง อยู่ได้7วัน
description.tw: 將防具精鍊效果變成紅色，持續7天。
description.vi: Quả cầu thần bí này sẽ thay đổi màu hào quang của áo giáp nâng cấp của bạn thành Đỏ. Kéo dài 7 ngày.
